update jwxt_classinfo
class_name = #{className,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
class_credit = #{classCredit,jdbcType=INTEGER},

update jwxt_classinfo set class_name = #{className,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, class_credit = #{classCredit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, class_tutor = #{classTutor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, class_time = #{classTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, class_location = #{classLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, class_vacancies = #{classVacancies,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, necessary = #{necessary,jdbcType=INTEGER} where class_id = #{classId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM jwxt_classinfo where class_id LIKE concat(concat('%',#{info}),'%') or (class_name LIKE concat(concat('%',#{info}),'%')) or (class_tutor LIKE concat(concat('%',#{info}),'%'))
